channel.title: Can anyone help me please
channel.description:
Since aryan died, I quit cheating, but today i wanted to start it again... So I downloaded scar, and i wanted to train my PKer, do i tried Bumfighter Pro 1.1 (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1978.0.html) I set everything up I dragged crosshair I started the script by pressing ctrl + alt + r, and my mouse moved to the top left of my screen then it moved to the top right of my screen, so it wasn't right, so i pressed ctrl + alt + s (stop) which didn't work, when i tryed to move the mouse, it moved a bit, but it went to the top right corner again... Then i tryed ctrl + alt + a, which didn't work either, so i pressed ctrl alt delete, and i could stop it...
But now, I can't cheat... Can anyone explain this, and want to help me to cheat?
Thank you Drunkenoldma

item.title: Can anyone help me please
item.dc:creator: @Drunkenoldma Drunkenoldma
item.description:
@Drunkenoldma wrote:

Ok, thx dude, i appreciate your help

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help me please
item.dc:creator: @eagertolearn eagertolearn
item.description:
@eagertolearn wrote:

it’s the script’s problem. sometimes this happens, bad script. and when u press ctr+ s make sure ur client is scar not runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help me please
item.dc:creator: @Drunkenoldma Drunkenoldma
item.description:
@Drunkenoldma wrote:

Since aryan died, I quit cheating, but today i wanted to start it again…
So I downloaded scar, and i wanted to train my PKer, do i tried Bumfighter Pro 1.1 (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1978.0.html)
I set everything up
I dragged crosshair
I started the script by pressing ctrl + alt + r, and my mouse moved to the top left of my screen
then it moved to the top right of my screen, so it wasn’t right, so i pressed ctrl + alt + s (stop) which didn’t work, when i tryed to move the mouse, it moved a bit, but it went to the top right corner again…
Then i tryed ctrl + alt + a, which didn’t work either, so i pressed ctrl alt delete, and i could stop it…

But now, I can’t cheat…
Can anyone explain this, and want to help me to cheat?

Thank you
Drunkenoldma

Read full topic
